tailors.name: Sri Lanka Tailoring House
tailors.description: Specializing in traditional wear and custom suits with 15+ years experience. Premium fabrics and meticulous craftsmanship.

tailors.name: Kandy Traditional Tailors
tailors.description: Experts in Kandyan traditional wear and wedding outfits with 25+ years of heritage. Authentic craftsmanship.

tailors.name: Galle Coastal Tailoring
tailors.description: Fast and reliable alterations with same-day service available. Perfect for travelers and expats.

tailors.name: Colombo Modern Tailors
tailors.description: Modern bespoke tailoring with premium fabrics from Italy and UK. Contemporary designs with traditional tailoring techniques.

tailors.name: Negombo Quick Stitch
tailors.description: Fast turnaround for all types of alterations and repairs. Popular with tourists and locals for quick fixes.

tailors.name: Jaffna Heritage Tailors
tailors.description: Preserving traditional Jaffna tailoring techniques since 1975. Specialists in Northern Sri Lankan traditional attire.

tailors.name: Matara Dressmakers
tailors.description: Specialists in batik clothing and traditional Sri Lankan wear. Family-friendly services with children's clothing.

tailors.name: Kurunegala Family Tailors
tailors.description: Family-run tailoring shop serving the community for 3 generations. Affordable and reliable service.

tailors.name: Anuradhapura Royal Stitch
tailors.description: Specializing in monk robes and traditional attire for religious and cultural events in the ancient city.

tailors.name: Batticaloa Seaside Tailors
tailors.description: Friendly local tailors offering affordable stitching near the lagoon. Great for casual and kids' wear.

tailors.name: Trinco Navy Tailors
tailors.description: Specializing in durable uniforms and workwear for port workers, navy personnel, and fishermen.

tailors.name: Polonnaruwa Heritage Stitch
